entry.title: This fund is national and is intended to provide financial...
entry.content:
Colorado - Familia: Trans Queer Liberation Movement

This fund is national and is intended to provide financial assistance for LGBTQ+ individuals applying for DACA for the first time. The applicant will be provided with legal services at no cost to them by a law firm and the check will be issued directly to USCIS as part of the application.

https://docs.google.com/…/1FAIpQLSedjc97c-33rvhqj…/viewform…

entry.content:
Colorado - Familia: Trans Queer Liberation MovementLal Legal PLC

We've some limited funding to help first-time #LGBTQ applicants for #DACA

If you qualify, you’ve to fill out this questionnaire bit.ly/LGBTDACAFEE and we’ll be in touch.

entry.title: Colorado - Familia: Trans Queer Liberation MovementFamilia: Trans Queer Liberation Movement was live.Ten years after the Dream Act failed in...
entry.content:
Colorado - Familia: Trans Queer Liberation MovementFamilia: Trans Queer Liberation Movement was live.

Ten years after the Dream Act failed in the Senate on December 18, 2010, join us now for a virtual panel conversation with immigrant rights organizers and leade...rs as they share their reflections and, as we enter 2021, ask whether national leaders have learned the lessons of past failures.
Speakers:
- Erika Andiola
- Jorge Gutierrez
- Lizbeth Mateo
- Neidi Dominguez

See More

entry.title: Ten years after the Dream Act failed in the Senate on December...
entry.content:
Colorado - Familia: Trans Queer Liberation Movement

Ten years after the Dream Act failed in the Senate on December 18, 2010, join us for a virtual panel conversation with immigrant rights organizers and leaders as they share their reflections and, as we enter 2021, ask whether national leaders have learned the lessons of past failures.

Speakers:
- Erika Andiola
- Jorge Gutierrez...
- Lizbeth Mateo
- Neidi Dominguez

Live streaming on these FB pages:
- https://www.facebook.com/Familiatqlm
- https://www.facebook.com/ImmJusticeNetwork
- https://www.facebook.com/raicestexas
- https://www.facebook.com/NeverAgainAction

https://fb.me/e/484ma4Tgu

THU, DEC 17, 2020

Post the Dream Act...A DECADE LATER

entry.title: 🔴 NOW: Judge orders restoration of DACA, opening Immigration...
entry.content:
Colorado - Familia: Trans Queer Liberation Movement

🔴 NOW: Judge orders restoration of DACA, opening Immigration program to new applicants for first time since 2017.

One million undocumented immigrant teens and young adults who qualify for DACA on paper could apply for the Obama-era protections from deportation following the court order.

cbsnews.com

Judge orders restoration of DACA, opening immigration program to new applicants for first time since 2017

One million undocumented immigrant teens and young adults who qualify for DACA on paper could apply for the Obama-era protections from deportation following the court order.One million undocumented immigrant teens and young adults who qualify for DACA on paper could apply for the Obama-era protections from deportation following the court order.

entry.title: Dalit Baum of AFSC and Jacinta of Mijente take us into a deeper...
entry.content:
Colorado - Familia: Trans Queer Liberation Movement

Dalit Baum of AFSC and Jacinta of Mijente take us into a deeper exploration of the New to Denver Tech Company in bed with ICE, Palantir

****Dalit Baum de AFSC y Jacinta de Mijente nos llevan a una exploración más profunda de New to Denver Tech Company en la cama con ICE, Palantir

Simultaneous interpretation will be provided by the Community Language Cooperative.

...

****La Cooperativa Comunitaria de Idiomas proporcionará interpretación simultánea.

Register in advance for this meeting:
https://us02web.zoom.us/…/tZ0rceCpqD0pGNw1R0iIiSFmzIZreEfO0…
After registering, you will receive a confirmation email containing information about joining the meeting.

https://us02web.zoom.us/…/tZ0rceCpqD0pGNw1R0iIiSFmzIZreEfO0…

entry.title: Colorado - Familia: Trans Queer Liberation MovementPadres & Jóvenes Unidos was live.The company, Palantir Technologies, is ICE’s...
entry.content:
Colorado - Familia: Trans Queer Liberation MovementPadres & Jóvenes Unidos was live.

The company, Palantir Technologies, is ICE’s technology backbone, providing the digital infrastructure to surveil, detain and deport immigrants. Palantir’s tool...s have been used to conduct mass workplace raids, including the biggest raid in US history in which 680 people were detained in Mississippi. Palantir moved its headquarters to Colorado this month. Let's show them that they are not welcome in our city and state! We will not let Palantir profile our people and separate our families.

See More

entry.title: 🚨 TODAY: Join Coloradans as we refuse to partner with...
entry.content:
Colorado - Familia: Trans Queer Liberation Movement

🚨 TODAY:

Join Coloradans as we refuse to partner with Palantir by giving them a hearty unwelcome!

The company, Palantir Technologies, is ICE’s technology backbone, providing the digital infrastructure to surveil, detain and deport immigrants. Palantir’s tools have been used to conduct mass workplace raids, including the biggest raid in US history in which 680 people were detained in Mississippi. Palantir moved its headquarters to Colorado this month. Let's show them that th...ey are not welcome in our city and state! We will not let Palantir profile our people and separate our families.

Meet outside 1555 Blake Street at 4pm for a socially distant "Unwelcome Party"! MASKS REQUIRED! And Sign this petition to pledge your resistance to Palantir and ICE: https://actionnetwork.org/…/palantir-out-of-colorado-palan…/

See More

TUE, SEP 22, 2020

Unwelcome Party for Palantir

1555 Blake St, Denver, CO 80202-1321, United StatesCauses · 435 people
